about_the_game:
You guys asked for them, and now here they are! We're thrilled to share with you a series of FREE digital comic books, the Endless Space 2 - Stories.

Each story will give more insight into the factions of the Endless universe, from the empire-wide point of view of the game to the ordinary – or extraordinary – days in the life of somebody, somewhere in the Endless galaxy.

Endless Space 2 - Stories is a freely downloadable compilation of digital comic books that we will continue to enrich with new content, so stay tuned!

NOTE: To access the Digital Artbook:



1. Go to your "Endless Space 2" properties in your Steam Library
2. Browse local files
3. Open the "Stories" folder

CONTENT
